meanings.sent1: After the storm passed, the sun relumines the sky.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight relumines the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The firefly relumines its light after a short break.
meanings.sent4: Her smile relumines the room, bringing warmth to all.
meanings.sent5: The stars relumines the night sky, creating a magical scene.

meanings.definition: To make something shine brightly again.
meanings.sent1: She uses a cloth to relumines the mirror.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler relumines the old necklace to make it sparkle.
meanings.sent3: The car wash relumines the vehicles, making them look brand new.
meanings.sent4: His kind words relumines her day, brightening her mood.
meanings.sent5: The cleaning solution relumines the dirty windows, making them crystal clear.
